history.proof: intros R a b Hin_a Hin_b HredIn. srun best use: lem_redIn_nil.

ctx: intros R a b Hin_a Hin_b HredIn.
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) R : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) a, b : poly A0 eqA ltM Hin_a : In a R Hin_b : In b R HredIn : redIn a b R nil R Unable to unify "redIn ?M2320 ?M2321 ?M2317 R ?M2319" with "reds a b R".

ctx: intros R a b Hin_a Hin_b HredIn.
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) R : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) a, b : poly A0 eqA ltM Hin_a : In a R Hin_b : In b R HredIn : redIn a b R nil R Unable to unify "In a R" with "reds a b R".

original: intros R a b Hin_a Hin_b HredIn. apply redIn0 with (Q := R). apply Hin_a.
